author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...COSME CONTINUES TO WEAKEN... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW ON WEDNESDAY...
summary: ...COSME CONTINUES TO WEAKEN... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW ON WEDNESDAY... As of 21:00 UTC TUE JUN 10 2025 the center of Cosme was located near 15.8, -115.1 with movement NNW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...COSME CONTINUES TO WEAKEN... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW ON WEDNESDAY... As of 21:00 UTC TUE JUN 10 2025 the center of Cosme was located near 15.8, -115.1 with movement NNW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Cosme (EP3/EP032025)
